Invocation Name: sleep inertia
des:
"The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment, or diagnosis. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number." 
An Infotainment story, by Vayu Vaidya, a premium health research facility.
This story is about sleep inertia, a tendency to oversleep at home and work and suggests many solutions, including D.I.Y tele-presence and digidoug like technologies, it also promotes nap pods at work places and healthy napping at school and work.
The above skill is a short excerpt from a longer interactive Infotainment, published seperately.
This service by Vayu Vaidya is accompanied by a Green Clinic for alternative solutions, both online and soon to come to a campus close to you. Prescription and inexpensive telepresence and sleep at work technologies are prescribed at this clinic. Watch this space for more details.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
